professional.title: SEB - Login Client
professional.description: The login application of swedish bank SEB, powered by Angular. Highly configurable. Refactored the entire application from one single module into multiple feature modules to enable lazy loading. Implemented NGRX-state management, QR-functionality among others.

professional.title: SEB - General Signing Surface
professional.description: A micro service app used by the entire bank in order to sign payments, documents etc. Powered by angular. Written by me from scratch.
